title: Meadow.Foundation Peripherals Library
description: The Meadow.Foundation peripherals library is an open source repository of drivers for various peripherals such as sensors, motors, displays, cameras, and other peripherals which make it easy to add hardware to your Meadow application.

frontMatter.title: Meadow.Foundation Peripherals Library
frontMatter.subtitle: Drivers for hardware peripherals such as sensors, buttons, displays, and more!
